*/import{useEffect,useRef}from"react";// prop-types is a library for typechecking of props
// Dropzone components

import"dropzone/dist/dropzone.css";// Material Dashboard 2 PRO React components
import MDBox from"components/MDBox";// Custom styles for the MDDropzone
import MDDropzoneRoot from"components/MDDropzone/MDDropzoneRoot";// Material Dashboard 2 PRO React context
import{useMaterialUIController}from"context";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MDDropzone(_ref){let{options}=_ref;const[controller]=useMaterialUIController();const{darkMode}=controller;const dropzoneRef=useRef();useEffect(()=>{Dropzone.autoDiscover=false;function createDropzone(){return new Dropzone(dropzoneRef.current,{...options});}function removeDropzone(){if(Dropzone.instances.length>0)Dropzone.instances.forEach(dz=>dz.destroy());}createDropzone();return()=>removeDropzone();},[options]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDDropzoneRoot,{component:"form",action:"/file-upload",ref:dropzoneRef,className:"form-control dropzone",ownerState:{darkMode},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{className:"fallback",bgColor:"transparent",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{component:"input",name:"file",type:"file",multiple:true})})});}// Typechecking props for the MDDropzone
